title: Microlearning for Developing Emotional Intelligence for Engineering Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A customized course for enhancing emotional competencies of technical leaders within corporations, based on team collaboration scenarios in real work environments.

learning_goals: Improve self-emotion recognition accuracy by 30% or more through project-based task performance.
Reduce conflict resolution time by 20% by applying emotion regulation techniques in team conflict situations.
Enhance team communication efficiency by 25% by cultivating the ability to interpret the emotions of diverse stakeholders.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
